hero.tittle: We are moved by a great purpose
hero.subtitle: Contributing to the construction of a better country has led us to develop a sustainable operating system and to create development programs such as financial education or advice on sustainability.

body.subtitle: Dematur was founded on March 20, 2022 with the purpose of being able to provide its customers with an online banking service in order to optimize people's valuable time through a friendly and dynamic interface for carrying out procedures. , expanding our services with brief guides so that you can learn to use online banking without having knowledge of one, thus managing to break the digital divide that exists worldwide. The purpose with which Demantur was founded is so that you can have a safe place where you can deposit your money, guarantee the security of your assets and offer you help in case you need to carry out any procedure quickly and safely from the comfort of your home. of your home or wherever you are, managing to promote economic knowledge today.
body.subtitle2: We have set out to break the digital divide that affects most of the world's population, ensuring that everyone has access to a service without having to be an expert in economics, for this an interface has been proposed that has informative guides in a free so you can know what is necessary for the functionality of online banking.

valor.subtitle: We are punctual in everything you may need.
valor.subtitle2: We value your integrity as a person and human being
valor.subtitle3: We always seek to provide a friendly hand to help you

loans_main_page.subtitle_loans: Find a solution to finance your future projects
loans_main_page.info_personal_loan: Enjoy your new life with the best conditions. We facilitate the procedures for you to consolidate your debts or carry out your projects with our Personal Credit.
loans_main_page.info_business_loan: If you work in your own business, this loan is for you, we provide it with special conditions so that you can consolidate your debts or carry out your new projects or improve the conditions of your company or enterprise.
loans_main_page.info_home_demantur: Take advantage of preferential conditions to request the credits you need to be able to purchase your new or used home in El Salvador.
loans_main_page.info_car_demantur: Our Loan is aimed at financing the purchase of a new or used vehicle. (Does not apply commercial vehicles; Trucks, Buses, Minibuses)

personal_loan_page.title: Personal Credits
personal_loan_page.subtitle: To achieve your goals, carry out your projects or for whatever you need.
personal_loan_page.personal_info: A personal credit is the operation in which a financial institution delivers a monetary amount specifically to a client, who must repay the loan in an agreed time plus the interest generated.
personal_loan_page.personal_info2: This type of credit differs from others because it is delivered without endorsements or additional guarantees, as is often the case, for example, with mortgage credit, where in addition to the personal responsibility of the client, it is necessary to prove a guarantee (the home).
personal_loan_page.benefits_banner2: Enjoy terms that fit your needs. Restrictions apply.

1.elderly: Be over 21 years old and under 65 years old.
1.receipts: Proof of proof of income, and in the case of independent merchants, present income tax and VAT declaration and financial statements.

2.bills: Personal expenses, debt consolidation, travel and studies.
2.commission: A commission of 0.5% applies to the amount of the credit if the term is 10 years. Zero commission if the term is 9 years or less.

forms.title: Are you decided?
forms.subtitle: Request your loans
forms.name: Full name
forms.company: Name of the company where you work

business_loan_page.title: Business Credits
business_loan_page.subtitle: Give new potential to your company/venture.
business_loan_page.business_info: We support you with medium and long-term credits for the acquisition of the equipment that is of interest for the business management of your company.
business_loan_page.business_info2: In order for your company to remain competitive, profitable and grow steadily, it is essential to have the necessary assets, from machinery to the property where daily operations are carried out.
business_loan_page.benefitsb_banner2: Get advice to better manage our financing

1.authorization: Authorization for research within the financial system.
1.payroll: List of current shareholders of the company.
1.state: Audited financial statements for the last three years
1.state2: Verification financial statements to the most recent date with its comparison of the same month of the previous year.
1.flow: Projected cash flow for one year on a monthly basis
1.rent: Income tax returns for the last two years

housing_page.title: Housing Credit
housing_page.subtitle: We offer you a loan tailored to your needs for your new home
housing_page.housing_info: This type of loan is made in the long term and will be backed by the property that is purchased. These loans can be financed for a certain term and at an interest rate that will depend on the amount you request to obtain what you need.
housing_page.housing_info2: It is important that you are clear that the fact that the property is the guarantee of the loan, that does not mean that we will keep your house or that you will not be able to use it until you finish paying the debt.
housing_page.benefits_bannerh2: Te financiamos hasta un valor del 90% del valúo.

1.constancy: Work certificate or pay slip if you are salaried.

2.value: Minimum value from US$50,000 to US$350,000 established by experts authorized by the SSF.
2.bills: Consultar tarifas preferenciales de gastos según el destino del crédito.
2.amount: Life insurance according to credit amount and construction damage insurance.

Demantur_car.title: Car Credit
Demantur_car.subtitle: Change your lifestyle with our decreasing credit for the purchase of a new or used vehicle
Demantur_car.car_info: We offer you the option of acquiring a vehicle with the figure of lease with purchase option, which will allow you to acquire ownership of the vehicle at the end of the term..
Demantur_car.car_info2: You have financing in a new vehicle of up to 90% according to the quote with the vehicle insurance fee included.
Demantur_car.benefits_bannerc2: We listen to you, we understand your needs and we offer you the most suitable plan for your project.

help.help_desc: Here are some of the questions frequently asked by our users.
help.help_search: You can also perform a quick search on your question to be consulted

1.tittle: What are the requirements to open a bank account?
1.desc: To open a bank account you need to meet the following requirements:
1.sub_desc2: If you are a foreigner you must present your passport

2.desc: If you were a victim of credit or debit card theft, we advise you to report it immediately, through our contact page, fill in all the information requested and enter your card number in order to solve the problem as soon as possible.

3.desc: Here are a few tips that can help you when making online transactions:
3.sub_desc1: You should verify that the site you are visiting is secure.
3.sub_desc2: Do not perform transactions on devices that are not yours or public devices.
3.Sub_desc3: Never enter personal information to sites that are insecure.
3.sub_desc4: Use antivirus to detect and block threats, to prevent design vulnerabilities from being exploited by malicious code.

4.desc: Here are some tips to improve your finances and avoid unnecessary expenses.
4.sub_tittle2: Make a list of all your expenses:
4.sub_tittle4: Don't go into debt to cover other debts:
4.sub_desc1: The first step to manage your money well is to know what you want to achieve with it.
4.sub_desc2: Making a list of all your expenses is the most important, it helps you realize what you are spending your money on and how much you are spending.
4.sub_desc3: For example, rent, electricity, water, etc. Spending less on fixed expenses is possible, you just have to be aware of how you use them and identify if you can save a little on them.
4.Sub_desc4: If you already have debts, acquiring new ones to pay the old ones is not ideal. There are refinancing methods, but they should be the last options, as well as taking into account their implications.
4.sub_desc5: To avoid overspending and going over budget, it is recommended to buy only what is necessary and to plan your purchases.
4.sub_desc6: Probably one of the most important tips. In order to achieve your goals, you must have the support of a good savings that will allow you to enjoy in the future.

5.tittle: How can you view my account statement?
5.desc: If you need to view your account statement?, here is a simple and easy way to do it:
5.sub_desc1: As a first step you must go to our navigation bar, and go to where it says Sign In.
5.sub_desc2: Then you must log in with your email and password.
5.sub_desc3: Once logged in you must go to the Accounts section.
5.sub_desc4: Once you are there, click on Digital Account Status.
5.sub_desc5: Now you will be able to see your account statement and all your transactions.

6.tittle: What are the requirements to acquire a savings account?
6.desc: The requirements to open a savings account are:
6.sub_desc2: Present your DUI, in case you are a foreigner you must present your resident card or passport with updated information, current and in good condition.

7.tittle: How to apply for a credit or debit card?
7.desc: In order to apply for a credit or debit card, here's how to do it:
7.sub_desc1: As a first step you must go to our navigation bar, and go to the Cards page.
7.sub_desc2: This will take you to another page that shows you the cards that our bank has.
7.sub_desc3: Once you are on that page you must choose the card you want, remember that each one has different requirements, choose the one that best suits you.
7.sub_desc4: After you have chosen the card, you must fill out a form to apply for the card.
7.sub_desc5: After you have filled out the form and submitted it, we will contact you to notify you if your card was accepted or denied.

8.tittle: How to open a savings account for a young minor?
8.desc: A minor between 16 and 18 years of age can open a private savings account as account holder with a minimum amount of $25.00, and must present a valid minor's identification card.

9.tittle: What are the requirements for a personal loan?
9.desc: In order to apply for a personal loan you must meet the following requirements:
9.sub_desc1: Be over 21 years old and under 70 years old.
9.sub_desc4: Have a margin of at least $300.

10.tittle: What are the requirements for a business loan?
10.desc: In order to apply for a personal loan you must meet the following requirements:
10.sub_desc1: Be a formal company or individual with business activity.
10.sub_desc2: Have a favorable credit bureau record.
10.sub_desc3: At least two years of antiquity.
10.sub_desc4: Prove sufficient cash flow generation to meet the financing.
10.sub_desc5: Present all the documentation requested by the bank.

11.tittle: Can another person deposit into an account, without being the account holder?
11.desc: Yes, another person who is not the account holder can deposit into the account by presenting their DUI and the account number to which they wish to make the deposit.

12.tittle: Can a foreigner apply for a personal loan?
12.desc: Yes, those who have permanent residence in the country can apply for a personal loan. For which they must present a valid passport, permanent resident card, NIT, receipts of collectors and prove income in the country.

ClassicPage.sub-tittle: Everything you need at your fingertips
ClassicPage.desc: The Demantur Classic credit card provides you with the necessary benefits for your day to day life, with it you have a secure payment method to use in stores, online purchases, etc. In addition, you have immediate cash withdrawal at national ATMs, find more detailed information below.

benefit.tittle: Enjoy the best benefits offered by this card

1.desc: Receive 500 points for your first purchase, then accumulate 1 point for every $5 you spend

2.desc: Pay in installments of up to 36 months according to your possibilities with a fixed interest rate.

3.desc: Withdraw cash with your card whenever you need it at all our ATMs nationwide

requirements.3: Completed application, either physical or web form
requirements.4: Photocopy of DUI and NIT (front and back)
requirements.5: Proof of current income signed by the company, copy of pay stubs or AFP proof of the last 6 months

conditions.1: The 500 welcome points will be awarded after spending a minimum of $30 with the card
conditions.2: The limit of accumulable points is 20,000
conditions.3: The financing term must not exceed 60 months
conditions.4: Interest rates will be set according to the amount of the financing, but will not be less than 15%
conditions.5: Charge-off fee of 4% of the card limit ($7,500)

benefit-banner.desc: Get many offers and promotions on products when you pay with your credit card

PlatinumPage.sub-tittle: Reach far, where your dreams point
PlatinumPage.desc: Are you looking for a card that allows you to enjoy great benefits anywhere and anytime? If so, the Demantur Platinum card is for you, get numerous benefits that adapt to your needs with great flexibility. You can travel, buy whatever you want and have the security you need for each of your purchases, check out many more benefits below

benefit.tittle: Enjoy the best benefits offered by this card

1.desc: Receive 5,000 welcome points after using your card for the first time, regardless of the amount.

2.desc: Accumulate points for every dollar you spend, 1 dollar equals 1 more point accumulated.

3.desc: You can redeem for cash your points at any time.

4.desc: Get interest-free installments up to 48 months, you can choose the term that suits you best.

5.desc: Get a refund in case the item is damaged, either for exchange or repair.

6.desc: Enjoy special prices on products from selected stores when paying with your card.

requirements.2: Job stability; 6 months with card experience or 12 months without card experience.
requirements.3: Completed application, either physical or web form
requirements.4: Photocopy of DUI and NIT (front and back)
requirements.5: Proof of current income signed by the company, copy of pay stubs or AFP proof of the last 6 months

conditions.1: The limit of accumulable points is 100,000.
conditions.2: The reimbursement offered to you by the purchase insurance will be equal to the amount that the product originally has
conditions.3: Interest-free installments will be subject to the conditions of the place where you obtain your credit, and sometimes they will not be available
conditions.4: To use your travel points you must not have any overdue payments in the last 6 months
conditions.5: The maximum amount of cash you can redeem for your points is $7,500.

benefit-banner.desc: You can redeem your accumulated points for airline tickets to selected destinations

GoldPage.sub-tittle: Live to the fullest, do not limit yourself and achieve your goals
GoldPage.desc: Get many more possibilities, superior benefits and a higher level of purchase and cash with the Demantur Gold card, with it you will always have that quality support and greater security, confidence and that support you deserve. The Demantur Gold is designed for those people like you, who are always looking for that exigency and good level in a credit card, discover more benefits below.

benefit.tittle: Enjoy the best benefits offered by this card

1.desc: Receive a reimbursement for protection against damage, theft or accidents for each product you buy with the card.

2.desc: Earn 10,000 cumulative welcome points after using your card for the first time regardless of the amount you spend.

3.desc: You can redeem your accumulated points for airline tickets to selected destinations and enjoy exploring the world.

4.desc: Receive additional protection that will extend the warranty time up to one year beyond the manufacturer's warranty.

5.desc: Your installments will have an interest rate of 8%, and can even go down depending on your credit history or the term.

6.desc: You will have cash coverage of up to $50,000 in immediate withdrawal for your use.

requirements.2: Verifiable job stability; 12 months of card-carrying experience
requirements.3: Completed application, either physical or web form
requirements.4: Photocopy of DUI and NIT (front and back)
requirements.5: Proof of current income signed by the company, copy of pay stubs or AFP proof of the last 6 months

conditions.2: Purchase protection will reimburse you for expenses to have the covered item repaired or compensate you for the original value of the item
conditions.3: The item covered by the warranty must have a minimum original manufacturer's warranty of 3 months up to three years
conditions.4: Maximum cash coverage may be requested as long as you are no more than 2 payments past due on your card

benefit-banner.desc: This benefit will help you obtain cash in case your card is lost or stolen

BlackCard.sub-tittle: Enjoy the world as only you deserve it
BlackCard.desc: When we talk about the Mastercard Black card we are aware that it is something superior, get that prestige, recognition, exclusivity and obviously wonderful benefits that only this card is able to give you, live a world full of possibilities and dreams, travel, extrafinanciameitos, protections, assistance, VIP lounges, among many other things with which to enjoy life to the fullest, check below for more information.

benefit.tittle: Enjoy the best benefits offered by this card

1.desc: Enjoy access to Lounge Key lounges and get tailored offers at restaurants, spas and stores in the airports.

2.desc: You can get that extra line of financing to your credit card and have cash available in a quick and easy way.

3.desc: We provide travel assistance when you are away, you can get information about the destination, emergencies, identifications, etc.

4.desc: Receive additional protection that will extend the warranty time up to one year beyond the manufacturer's warranty.

5.desc: Earn 80,000 cumulative welcome points after using your card for the first time regardless of the amount you spend.

6.desc: Receive a reimbursement for protection against damage, theft or accidents for each product you buy with the card.

conditions.2: Baggage protection will reimburse you up to $3000 for permanently lost baggage and up to $600 for delays of more than 4 hours

DebitCard.sub-tittle: Keep control of your money and save
DebitCard.desc: With the Demantur Classic Debit card you get the expense control you need, you will be able to pay in the different services and businesses without having to carry cash, but you will also be able to access cash through ATMs if you need it. On the other hand, do not hesitate to always have the special benefits that Demantur offers you, we invite you to continue to see the other details below.

benefit.tittle: Enjoy the best benefits offered by this card

1.desc: The Classic Debit card gives you the ease of always paying even if you don't have cash with you, it's more practical if you prefer to always load your card instead of carrying large amounts of cash

2.desc: By not loading cash you have the security of not losing it, and if you lose the card, you can cancel it and avoid the loss of the funds stored on it

3.desc: By making use of your own funds you do not have to pay interest or fees month to month and at no time accumulate debt with it, save more and maintain the efficiency of your money at all times when you use it

requirements.3: Completed application, either physical or web form
requirements.4: Photocopy of DUI and NIT (right and back)

conditions.1: To have the purchase alert service with your card you will have to contract it at a later date for a one-time extra charge
conditions.2: The cost of card reissue in case of theft or loss is $4.85 + VAT.
conditions.3: The fee for cash withdrawals at ATMs from the sixth transaction onwards is $0.65 + VAT
conditions.4: The fee for cash withdrawals at ATMs in another local network is $2.65 + VAT per transaction

benefit-banner.sub-tittle: Earn points for each of your purchases
benefit-banner.desc: Get 1 point for every $2.00 you spend with your debit card

banner.tittle: Do you want to contact us?
banner.desc: Leave your question, comment or suggestion, we are ready to help you

ContactPage.desc: We will receive your query, comment etc., we will evaluate it and then we will solve it, then we will notify you by phone or email giving you the solution. If in any case you are not satisfied with the answer you can contact us again giving us your management number that was given to you previously in the notification in order to continue with your particular case.
